title: Video: Huge Pileup Stuns Peloton in Opening Stage of UAE Tour Women
content:
Letizia Paternoster abandons and many left banged up after dozens of riders scatter to the tarmac in opening day of Women's WorldTour.

Read the full article at Video: Huge Pileup Stuns Peloton in Opening Stage of UAE Tour Women on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
